trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
There were no other sightings in Henderson on or around July 14th 2008
Summary: Two tiny star-like objects spotted directly above my house and they flew westward.
divs: Sighting DetailsActually, the first occurrence happened on the morning of the 13th @ approximently 2:45am. For some unknown reason I didn't feel tired, so I went outside to see if I could spot the black widow spider that had been making webs from the rosemary bushes to the sidewalk in front of my house. I saw no spider. Then I began to look at the stars. As I was taking in their beauty, I noticed one star-like object traveling northward. When I spotted the object it was straight above. I knew it was moving, because it passed the other stars. I assumed it to be a satellite. It made no sound and stayed on the same trajectory. On this monday morning, I got up to take a wiz, and then just thought, 'I wonder if I could spot that sattelite again'. At approximately 3:00am, much to my surprise, I spotted two star-like objects. They passed the same stars that I had seen yesterday. That's how I knew they were moving. At first they flew parallel, about four fingers apart. Then they began to converge. As they were converging, a very recognizable commercial jet flew underneath them. The jet was heading east and made the usual noise. The star-like objects flew silently and northward. They then flew closer to each other, two fingers apart. Then they disappeared into a cloud. I watched on the other side of the cloud to see if they would reappear, but the distance must have been too great. I could not see them anymore. I came in and checked the time on the micro wave oven and made a note for me. Then I thought maybe I should share these experiences.
